Literature.Title: The rumen microbiome: an underexplored resource for novel antimicrobial discovery.
Literature.Author: Oyama LB, Girdwood SE, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MRSA-15(MIC=250µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Q14-0320(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13442(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae Q14-0095(MIC=>128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii Q13-0717(MIC=64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii Q12-0809(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii Q12-0867(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Q14-0208(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Q14-0890(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Q12-0581(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>128µg/ml),Campylobacter jejuni NCTC 11351(MIC=>128µg/ml),Campylobacter jejuni(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium SL1344(MIC=256µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis JH-2-2(MIC=256µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes NCTC 11994(MIC=128µg/ml)
